Image interpolation
  • Command Line Interface (CLI)
  • View page source

Command Line Interface (CLI)

interpolation

interpolation [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options

--version

Show the version and exit.

image-interpolate

This script interpolates image from SOURCE to OUTPUT

OUTPUT image will have size WIDTH*HEIGHT

interpolation image-interpolate [OPTIONS] SOURCE OUTPUT WIDTH HEIGHT

Options

-f, --force

Overwriting output file without asking

Arguments

SOURCE

Required argument

OUTPUT

Required argument

WIDTH

Required argument

HEIGHT

Required argument
